document.full_text: french dairy group lactalis on tuesday launched a 3.4 billion euro ($4.9 billion) takeover bid for rival parmalat , prompting intervention by italy and france to defuse a row over control of the italian company.
document.title: lactalis parmalat bid spurs italy-france pact
lines_and_colors: french dairy group lactalis on tuesday launched a 3.4 billion euro ($4.9 billion) takeover bid for rival parmalat , prompting intervention by italy and france to defuse a row over control of the italian company.
